homepage.intro: Understand how Machine Learning works by using 3D animation and simple explanations.
homepage.first_paper_text: Understand the underlying mathematics using visual methods.
homepage.second_paper_text: We take you through the learning process with no sudden jumps along the way!
homepage.third_paper_text: Never lose track of where you are.
homepage.fourth_paper_text: Finally get that one topic you could never master!

algorithms.choose_alg: Simply choose one of the following algorithms and start learning!

linear_regression.info: This algorithm finds the closest linear line to all the points
linear_regression.label: Linear Regression

gradient_descent.info: This algorithm helps in finiding the minimal point of a function
gradient_descent.label: Gradiant Descent

knn.info: This algorithm predicts the type of an object based on its k-nearest-neighbors
knn.label: K Nearest Neighbors

neural_networks.info: This algorithm predicts the right answer
neural_networks.label: Neural Networks

logistic_regression.info: This algorithm finds the closest line to all the points
logistic_regression.label: Logistic Regression

gd.description: Gradient descent is an iterative algorithm for finding a local minimum.
gd.idea: The idea is to take repeated steps in the opposite direction of the gradient (derivative) of the function at the current point.

slides.derivative: The derivative of the function is
